info.title: Document Search API
info.description: A powerful document search API engine using TNT Search for fast full-text search capabilities. This API supports multi-tenant workspaces, document upload, text extraction, and advanced search features.

get.description: Get a paginated list of all documents in the workspace

post.description: Upload a document file to the workspace and automatically extract text content for search indexing

project_id.description: Optional project ID to associate with document

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific document by ID

delete.description: Delete a document and remove it from search index

get.description: Download the original file of a document
Get statistical information about documents in the workspace

post.description: Index all unindexed documents in the workspace for search

get.description: Get the current status of the search index for the workspace

post.description: Rebuild the entire search index for the workspace

get.description: Get a paginated list of all projects in the workspace

post.description: Create a new project in the workspace

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific project by ID
Get detailed statistics for a specific project
Search for documents using full-text search with filters

post.description: Perform advanced search with multiple filters and sorting options

get.description: Get search term suggestions based on indexed content
